question: {name1} and {name2} are sisters from {city} who love collecting signatures from {celebrity_type}. During their {vacation_type} from school, the sisters spend every afternoon collecting signatures. After {n1} weeks, {name1} and {name2} compare their autograph books, counting up the number of signatures each sister has collected. {name1} has {s1} signatures in her book, and {name2} has {s2}. The sisters have {n2} more weeks of {vacation_type}, and they decide they want to reach {goal} signatures between them by the end of the break. How many signatures do the sisters need to collect to reach their goal?
